import React, { useState } from "react"; const Login = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: "", password: "" }); const { email, password } = formData; const onChange = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: [e.target.value] }); }; const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); }; return (

onChange(e)} value={email} class="form-control" />
onChange(e)} value={password} class="form-control" />
Recuperar Contraseña
); }; export default Login;
